trans-unit.source: Purchase Order Matrix Lines
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Property Caption

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Assigned User ID field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Assigned User ID - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the vendor who delivered the items.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Buy-from Vendor No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Description field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Description - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the document number.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Document No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the date you expect the items to be available in your warehouse.if you leave the field blank, it will be calculated as follows: Planned Receipt Date + Safety Lead Time + Inbound Warehouse Handling Time = Expected Receipt Date.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Expected Receipt Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Delivery Drop Code field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control K3PFDelivery Drop Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Season Code field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control K3PFSeason Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies a code for the location where you want the items to be placed when they are received.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Location Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of a general ledger account, item, additional cost, or fixed asset, depending on what you selected in the Type field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Confirmed field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX Confirmed - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Delivery Information
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX Delivery Information - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Invoice field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX Invoice - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the K3PFProduce-at Code field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX K3PFProduce-at Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the External Document No. field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX PC External Document No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Line Amount field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX PC Matrix Line Amount - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Outstanding Quantity field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX PC Matrix Outstanding Qty - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Qty. to Invoice field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX PC Matrix Qty. to Invoice - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the quantity of items that remains to be received.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX PC Matrix Qty. to Receive - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the quantity that should be received.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX PC Matrix Quantity - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Quantity Invoiced field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX PC Matrix Quantity Invoiced - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Quantity Received field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX PC Matrix Quantity Received - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Sales No. field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX Sales No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Sell-to Customer Name
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX Sell-to Customer Name - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control NPX Status - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Order Date field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Order Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Note of Goods field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control PEB Note of Goods - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Planned Receipt Date field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Planned Receipt Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of the related production order.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Prod. Order No. - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Promised Receipt Date field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Promised Receipt Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Requested Receipt Date field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Requested Receipt Date - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the line type.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Type - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Unit Cost field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Unit Cost - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Unit of Measure Code field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Unit of Measure Code - Property ToolTip

trans-unit.source: Specifies the value of the Variant Code field.
trans-unit.note: Page NPXPCPurch.OrderMatrixLines - Control Variant Code - Property ToolTip
